title: for an amenity being used for non-residential activities and under the control of private person(s) / organization(s), allotment of equivalent area under URS shall be at 50% of ASR Rate for commercial area up to 40 Sq
clause_text: for an amenity being used for non-residential activities and under the control of private person(s) / organization(s), allotment of equivalent area under URS shall be at 50% of ASR Rate for commercial area up to 40 Sq. Meters and at 100% of ASR Rate for commercial area above 40 Sq.m.;
